venue.name: Unleashed by Petco at the Bunker Hill Mall

item.description: Come Celebrate The Holiday Season Unleashed Style!!! On November 17 from 12-4PM Unleashed by Petco will be Serving Pumpkin and Turkey for the Pups Featuring Merrick Foods, and Pumpkin Pie and Apple Cider for the Parents!! We will also have a Coloring Contest for the kids to win a gift basket for your Dog!! All dog breeds and humans are welcome!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Fall Harvest Festival at Unleashed Charlestown!
